title: Vuelta a España Stage 10: Wout van Aert Bulldozes Break, Bullies Pacher for a Third Stage Win
content:
Van Aert attacked from the start of mid-mountain stage and didn't stop until he outsprinted last man standing Pacher, GC racers hit pause.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 10: Wout van Aert Bulldozes Break, Bullies Pacher for a Third Stage Win on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
